title: Exchange
description: (romantic sci-fi short story)Isolated on a distant planet, she is incarcerated for a crime she doesnâ€™t recall. She has no name, no idea where she came from, or why she is injected with drugs daily to hold these vital facts from her grasp. Despite small rebellions, she wastes away, worn and losing hope of ever being whole again.Then he arrives. Claiming to hold the answers burned daily from her brain, he offers her a way out. But at what cost?
author: Rachel Rossano
